snippet.title: Time Gal - Laserdisc Game - 1080p ESRGAN Upscale
snippet.description: An upscale of all of the footage from the classic laserdisc game Time Gal. Thanks much to Singe for providing the best LD rip that's out there. I gave it some of the ol' AVISynth treatment by removing most of the edge enhancement halos, denoising a bit, and trying to stabilize the animation lines. After the upscale with the BigOldies model I tweaked the color balance to get rid of the some of the red tint. Not a huge project or anything, but I've always loved these types of games for the animation.
